One thing I've always wondered about Crimson Comics is the timeline/canon for the girls in them. It seems like in some cases, the girls are removed from their "canon" and placed into an alternate one, like the rich ojou-sama whose butler is her lover and possessive master, yet she somehow ends up in the sex slave show.
